message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. This is a great deal, considering the product's worth to you is $10000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking of something a bit more reasonable. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8250. This is still a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $10000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $7000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $8000. This is still a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $10000. I'm not sure I'm willing to go any lower than this.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $6800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
